review: I own an Apple TV, two Roku's and the Amazon Fire.  The Amazon Fire is by far the best of the bunch.  It allows my family and I to watch what we want, when we want.  I am a cord cutter as well, so my streamer is important.  Amazing product Amazon!Note:  I plan to purchase more Amazon equipment due to the build quality and attention to detail.  Also, I do have a game controller.#awesomebuy
author: Amazon Customer

review: For the price a HDMI cable would have been nice....The unit is only a few days old, but it appears to be a bit "glitchy".....It is a "re-furb" after all....may send unit back if problems persist.
author: Matthew Regnier

review: Love it! This thing is so fast and the voice feature is amazing. Be prepared to spend an afternoon exploring what is in FireTV and adding apps and transferring apps. Can only hope it gets better. I love it so far, well done Amazon.
author: Jimmy Jo "Surfrat"

review: I really like this item but I would prefer an off switch. And I would like for the thing to run on my ZVOX sound bar which it does not. So for the two missing functions I have chopped two stars.
author: phxken

review: Terrible! Dead on arrival. Spent 2 hours trying to get it to work. Spent an hour on the phone with Amazon troubleshooting (3 different people) with the determination that it's probably a dead box that doesn't work which was sent to me. However, Amazon couldn't just send me a replacement since they had to do some internal checking before they could help me replace it. Very un-Amazon like. It was delivered 3 days late, didn't work, and I've been waiting 4 days since the 3 hours wasted to see if/how they can help get it replaced with one that may actually work. Huge waste of time and money so far. The Chrome stick is looking better and better. Will add a revision to the review if I ever manage to get a box that works.---Revised update: After a couple of weeks, Amazon eventually acknowledged they messed up, the box doesn't work and should have been immediately replaced by the first person I spoke to. The replacement unit worked fine and I'm mostly satisfied with it (why no off button? plus a couple other minor issues) Have updated my rating from 1 to 3.
author: Bejan

review: I think that the concept is great, it was very easy to installed, options are great, but the device has no on/off switch. If you want to watch cable/TV you have to disconnect the unit. I'm not sure I want to keep it. Maybe I missed something, if someone has the unit and knows of a on/off feature please post, thanks.
author: Cynthia A. Bowers

review: Defective remote. I just went through 4 sets of Energizer AAA batteries in 2 weeks. I spent two days setting up all the apps, accounts, etc. to get it just right, and Amazon support wants me to return whole thing. I just ordered another remote. When I get it, I'll just put the broken remote in the package, and send it back for a refund. This seems to be a common problem with the Fire TV. I don't know why they don't address the problem.
author: Chi Son

review: Hated it.  Returned it.  I hope Amazon does better with the redesign.
author: Dave in Everett "guy in Everett"

review: I bought two fireTV's, One as a gift and One for myself. My setup worked great on a wired network connection, but the results over wireless were poor and unusable. Obviously everyone's wireless setup is different, but it's safe to say over wired internet its a rock solid media center!
